title: Havelock City, Elibank Tower, 3 Bed Rooms Apartment For Sale
details:
Havelock city, Largest apartment complex in Colombo with a large garden land extent with a proposed on going mixed development as a city center
Highest standards of management and maintenance of the complex
3 Bed Rooms apartment for sale in Elibank tower
Higher floor with a garden and club house view
Higher rental return and higher value appreciation for the property
1500 sqft and large spacious apartment in the complex
Rare opportunity to buy an apartment in the complex
